creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: rectangular tray with low walls; scalloped short feet; red interior walls, edges, and feet; natural wood inside and outer walls
inscription:
on the box: 東大寺什煙草盆; on the label: によし莨盆によし　古香庵蔵

古香庵  東大寺伝来品　根來漆角盆; on the label: 桃山時代　根來角盆　古香庵蔵
菓子器に用ふるもよし広間莨盆にも珍点茶器
title: Rectangular footed tray
